/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban architecture. On the right side of the road, a red car is in motion, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. On the left side of the road, trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
